contentBlocks.content:
Introduction

Quirksmode has been developed in accordance with the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0. These guidelines have been published by the World Wide Web Consortium to promote accessibility.

Browser compatibility

Quirksmode strives to meet all browser requirements, but if you are having problems viewing our site you should upgrade to the latest version of one of the following links:

  • Microsoft Internet Explorer
  • Chrome
  • Mozilla Firefox
  • Safari
  • Opera

metadata.metaDesc: Quirksmode is a fully responsive Universal React Application connected to a Headless CMS designed and developed by myself, web enthusiast and all round nice guy Dave. It was created to be my Portfolio and voice to the world
